basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Lactobacillus casei ATCC 393 (++), L. casei ATCC 27139 (++), Lactobacillus rhamnosus ATCC 21052 (+++++), L. rhamnosus ATCC 14957 (+), Lactobacillus plantarum ATCC 8014 (+), Listeria innocua ATCC 33091 (++), L. innocua CIP 78.44 (++), Listeria monocytogens ATCC 19112 (+++), Listeria welshimeri ATCC 43551 (++), Listeria seeligeri CIP79.46 (++++).Note:+ indistinct inhibit zone with diameter 8-12 mm, ++ indistinct inhibit zone with diameter ≥12 mm, +++ clear inhibit zone with diameter 12-16 mm, ++++ clear inhibit zone with diameter 16-20 mm, and +++++ clear inhibit zone with diameter ≥20 mm.
